column5: Hope this is ok to request this on this forum. I'm towing my new RV motorhome to Lac Seul and towing my boat behind it. My fishing buddy is unable to come now and he was towing the Vehicle I tow behind my RV up to International Falls and dropping it off right before going across the border at a storage place I've rented. The plan was to come back and drop the boat off after two weeks at Goose Bay on Lac Seul and then pick up the car that was towed up there and spend the next two months touring Canada. I'd be very generous and I'm sure a profitable solution could be reached if someone was interested, would certainly make for your cheaper trip to Canada. The other option is have my wife follow behind to International Falls in the tow vehicle but she just had surgery so trying to avoid that if anyone is going to International Falls this weekend. The tow car is in Chicago currently, the northern suburbs is anyone is interested let me know. I'm heading up this weekend June 15th if it works for anyone. Thanks
Our group leaves for Canada on June 22nd and we overnight in International Falls that evening. We are heading up to Ear Falls on June 23rd in the morning. Does this help in any way?
Forgot to mention that we live in the greater Chicago area as well.

Hi my shipper never found anyone to tow to International Falla. can you either tow for me or you can drive it. I'll pay you the same as the shipper quoted. About to cross border call me at 563-380-4840. Hopefully I'll have cell coverage someplace Shipper hasn't got back to me in 4 days I'd rather trust a walleye fisherman. The Saturn vue is at my daughters in area code 60646 in Edgebrook northern most suburb of Chicago. You answered first but let me know if anyone else is interested since I need to solve this logistics problem. Thanks Jim
I just tried calling you My friend will also try calling you as well. Rich
